title: Fashion History Now #34: From Tea Towels to Tops, Upcycled Fashion with Selina Sanders
itunes:title: Fashion History Now #34: From Tea Towels to Tops, Upcycled Fashion with Selina Sanders
description:
Selina Sanders joins us to discuss the joy of upcycling fashion and her journey from the fashion industry to independent upcycle designer extraordinaire.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
